title: Question:
author: Crypto Library
created_time: August 27, 2022, 04:21:40 PMLast edit: May 22, 2023, 06:27:04 PM by Crypto Library
content: source Asia Cup 2022 has started from today. After the qualifying round, a total of six teams qualified for the event and were divided into two groups. Every team has put in a strong performance to qualify. Which two teams do you think will make it to the final and which team will take the cup?

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: Today is going to start a match India vs Pakistan . If we talk about today's game then I understand that India will win and their performance is better than Pakistan . And if we talk about the final match then according to me India and Bangladesh will get changes to play in the final match . And if so, it will be a tough fight between the two teams
